reviews.review:
[table]
[tr]
	[td]Rozgrywka[/td]
	[td]Wciąga na setki godzin. Jestem tego żywym przykładem :'D
[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Grafika[/td]
	[td]Grafika jest znakomita lecz sama optymalizacja to już inna sprawa. 7/10 [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Cena[/td]
	[td]Lepiej poczekać na przecenę bo te często się zdarzają.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Bugi[/td]
	[td]Podczas całej rozgrywki znalazłem ich zaledwie parę i mogę je policzyć na palcach dłoni.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Fabuła[/td]
	[td]O dziwo gra ma swój własny lore, a raczej każda postać ma swój własny co było dla mnie dużym zaskoczeniem i plusem dla samej gry. Mimo że jest on poboczny i nie wpływa na grę jest dopracowany, tłumaczy dlaczego dana postać ma taki a nie inny perk. 9/10 [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Czas gry[/td]
	[td]Gra nigdy się nie kończy a prawdziwym end-game'm jest wbicie 3 prestiżu na każdej grywalnej postaci. [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Możliwe fanowskie modyfikacje[/td]
	[td]Są, (np. fanowski wygląd perków) ale jest możliwość dostania przez to bana.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Poziom trudności[/td]
	[td]Zależy od posiadanej rangi na ocalałym/zabójcy.[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
	[td]Moja ocena[/td]
	[td]Gra miała swoje wzloty i upadki, a sam pomysł na grę jest nieszablonowy i błyskotliwy. Jakby poprawili optymalizację to z przyjemnością zmienię ocenę na wyższą, ponieważ mając rtx'a mam 90fps. 8/10[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

Здоров, туманный! Хочешь повеселиться? Заходи в игру и тебя взбодрят мигом! Тысячи отборных петухов ждут своей минуты, чтобы дое***ся до тебя своим криворуким маном: польские петухи, петухи-психопаты, кошерные петухи, классические кочеты — все как один ищут повода затунелить тебя в своей курятне! Еще думаешь? ЗАХОДИ СЕЙЧАС!
Die Map McMillan ist so unglaublich behindert.NEHMT DIE RAUS !! Die Map ist so beschissen klein und dazu gibt es nicht mal was zu dodgen ! Egal wo du stehst du wirst auf dieser Map immer verfolgt..

Dieses Spiel ist einfach super lustig wenn man es mit Freunde spielt.
Jedoch spielt man das mit Random Personen passiert es ZU Häufig das man dem Tot überlassen wird weil entweder der Ausgang frei ist und alle wegrennen und man selbst dann Stirbt weil man schon am Harken hängt ODER man wird am Harken Ignoriert auch wenn der Killer am anderen Ende der Map ist...
Was auch eher Negativ ist, ist das viele Killer campen das man am Harken 0 Chanche hat zu fliehen wodurch man sich nur aufregt... aber da man eh Irgnorirt wird von den mit Überlebenen ist das ja eh egal xD

Das Spiel hat ne Super Atmospähre, Die Figuren sind einfach zu Steuern und es Macht Spaß andere zu Töten.
Was neben den Nicht Koop mitspielern negativ ist, sind die Bugs... die Teilweise das Gewinnen unmöglich machen. Sei es das man durch den Bodenfällt. Man in der Luft schwebt und man sich nicht verstecken kann ODER das wenn man Doch mal gerettet wird das man obwohl man 3 Schritte vom Harken weggelaufen ist dennoch Vom Harken aufgespießt wird und man verloren hat... 
Wenn diese Bugs behoben werden wäre das Spiel Perfeckt.

I really like the game, I really do, but it is so hard, when their servers a like a potato. Its har to progess through the ranking system, when every 3th or 4th match is have server issues.
And another thing they really should be in control of now is the matchmaking system. You can spam the "Join" button for 15 min without getting in any game!! Who would make a game, where there is a chance of getting a place in lobby without a que system? PLEASE GO MAKE QUE SYSTEM SO WE GET A LOBBY WHEN THERE IS ONE, AND NOT WHEN WE LUCKILY PRESS "JOIN" WHEN THERE IS A SLOT OPEN! 
I will not recommend this game to anyone yet, before they fix their servers and the matchmaking.

Edit: They fixed it, so we good fam

5 years ago in 2016, I reviewed this game and gave it a thumbs down. Recently (2021) I've been playing it again and enjoyed it. Things changed over the 5 years, and credit to the devs for continuing to work on it and add characters.

A very unique kind of game, Scary good fun!

Tough learning curve though, I found that the dead by daylight subreddit was invaluable when it came to this game.
第一次接触这种类型的游戏，切身感受到在B级恐怖片里扮演角色的刺激感，与几个好友开黑更是其乐无穷。当初因为BUG太多而没有入手，现在游戏完善度已经挺高了，建议大家入手。没有基友一起开车的，当个屠夫挂萌新溜人皇也很刺激啊！
Крутой гемплей и музыка завораживающая, игра супер! Игра достойна премии!

This game has a lot of issues so it's definitely not for everyone. There's a heavy focus on a lot of money-grabbing schemes in the development right now and not a lot going on with fixing actual gameplay related issues. Really odd to see a game that's not F2P and still wants you to spend money on content long after release... but I suppose that's modern gaming for you. With that said, most of the content that influences gameplay directly is attainable through in-game currency that can be earned as you play.

Overall this is a game that I enjoy a lot. It's not perfectly balanced, not every match is going to be a great experience, and it can be a very frustrating experience if you're the kind of person who gets annoyed a lot by difficult/unfair experiences in games.

If you're looking for a game that builds on horror and creepy atmosphere then this isn't necessarily great for that in most cases. It's a matter of suspense, thrill, and mindgames in situations where split-second decisions mean life or death for survivors, or satisfaction vs disappointment as a killer.

If you're looking for a fun multiplayer game then this is kind of a gem in my eyes. A very flawed, far-from-perfect gem.
It's a good game but there're so many bugs please fix it and it's hard to find a match for survivor player

Ich habe das Spiel jetzt gut 100 Stunden gespielt und hier ist mein Fazit.

Pro:
- Das Spielprinzip macht richtig Spaß und hat Suchtfaktor pur. Ich konnte es noch nicht mit Freunden spielen , kann mir aber vorstellen, dass es dann noch witziger wird.
- Viele Features die das Grundspielprinzip aufwerten, noch spannender und interessanter machen.
- Die Entwickler arbeiten ständig daran und liefern Updates und man merkt, dass das Spiel immer besser wird, da ich schon ab dem Releasetag dabei war.

Kontra:
- Ich finde es immer noch ein bisschen unbalanciert manchmal, aber die Entwickler arbeiten daran, dies noch gerechter zu machen.
- Das Lobbysystem ist grauenhaft und momentan das größte Problem. Es frustriert einfach ständig wieder eine neue Lobby zu suchen, bis man endlich eine gefunden hat.
- Es sind noch ein paar kleinere Unstimmigkeiten drinnen, wie "durch Fenster schlagen oder Mauern" oder "das nicht Runterlassen vom Killer, wenn man fertig gewiggelt hat"!
Lobby simulator 2016

game is running much better with minimal bugs!

A great PvP concept that lacks polish. but still a fun game to play.

Dead by Daylight is a 4vs1 competitive multiplayer game. you take on the roll of either a survivor, who is trying to escape death and make it out of a hellish yard / acrage by working together with 3 other surviors. Or a Killer, who is trying to sacrifice the 4 survivors for the god it worships called the entity, using a variety of tools and abilities spread amoung different killers.

there are 5 different survivors to choose from, and 4 different killers. the survivors all function pretty much the same, each one has a crouch, run, and wiggle / escape move. the killers each have a unique ability that changes how survivors should act each game ranging from a chainsaw sprint, to being able to turn invisible. killers and survivors can be upgraded to unlock perks, addons and offerings via points you earn every game you finish. you can level up to 50 with each survivor / killer and ascend (prestige. basically) to unlock a cosmetic item for that character.

Playing with friends is really fun but you dont earn any experiance doing private games. online games can be really tough, because starting out, everyone is pretty much max level rocking 4 perks. im a rank 17, level 18 killer getting matched with rank 1 - rank 6 survivors. currently I am on a 5 game losing streak.

If you are looking for a good lan game to play with your friends. Dead by Daylight is an excellent choice! the actual matchmaking can be frustrating because you will be playing with / against players that will have a significant advantage over what you can currently do.

7/10

Fun game, love being a killer. perks and addons need more polish, and matchmaking needs to be adjusted so players get fairly matched with people around their level.
很棒的游戏，根本停不下来，玩人的心跳太刺激了，玩鬼砍人好爽，那血溅的，看着好爽

Solid game, Love the asymmetric gameplay. In bad need of a few fixes (match making is a nightmare). As survivor it can be very hard to find a match if you have 2 or 3 in your party, and you have to ready up everytime the game fails to find you a match. It's very common to get matched with people who have all the best perks. hacking can be a problem aswell. Over all this game has a lot of potential if they fix a few issues, as is its "solid" it has the ability to be "amazing". Best Played with friends.

Oyunun bazı yönleri güzel bazı yönleri kötü oyunda bug olayı aşırı derecede fazla ve oyunda görüntü olayı hep aynı yani demek istediğim oyunu hard da oynasanız aynı havayı veriyor low da oynasanızda aynı havayı veriyor ve oyunda rank sistemi karışık takıma kötü oyuncuda gelebilir iyi oyuncuda karşınıza katili kasmış oyuncuda gelebilir katili iyi oynamayanda gelebilir ve oyun da türk sayısıda mevcut ve genelde türk katiller camp yapıyor bari siz yapmayın oyun bittik den sonra chat küfür etmeye başlıyan oyuncular yada profiline -rep yazanlar kendinlerini pro zannediyorlar galiba cidden rahatsız edici bir durum bu ve lütfen bu kendisini katile boostlatanlar yada bu campleyen katiller oyunun rating düşürürler bir çözüm bulunmassa buna oyun oyuncularını kaybedebilir. oyunda 4 çeşit katil oldu öncelikleri tabi oyunda 3 katil vardı tabi sonra bedava gelen dlc ile biraz bok olduğu için yine bence oyun biraz düşüş yarattı ayrıca bir şey daha vurgulamak istiyorum oyunu kaç kişi oynıyor bilmiyorum ama oyunda nedense biraz zor oyun lobisi buluyor neyden kaynaklanıyor bilmiyorum onada bir çeki düzen verilmesi gerekiliyor bence yoksa bu oyun daha düşüşlere gider böyle çünkü yeni çıkan bu nurse karakteri hadi ışınlanmasına bişey demiyorum ama bu soktuğumun nurse calling perk ne diye o karaktere yaparlar ki arkadaş yani diyecek bişey yok oyunu arkadaşlarınızla çok eğlenceli oluyor oyun devamlı oynanılacak bir oyunmu tartışılır yinede oyunu tavsiye ederim...
uzun bir inceleme oldu ama kusura bakmayın/


Bu oyunu 1 hafta bedava oynayıp da indirimli alanları bilmem de 1 hafta niyetine oynayıp da ranka emek vermiş insanların oyununa gelip oyun başlamadan yada başladıktan sonra disconnect çekip adamların rank düşüren hasiyetsizlere sesleniyorum gün yüzü görme hakkınız yok sizin he toprak kabul etmez sizi onu söyliyim milletin vaktini çalıcağınıza güzel güzel oynasanıza yada oyunu alın indirimdeyken bu kadar mı fakirsiniz anlamadım ki milletin emeğini hakkını yiyeceğinize adam gibi oynasanıza yazık valla böyle yapınca elinize bir şey geçmez.

Oyuna zamanında tavsiye etmişim de şimdi uzun bir aradan sonra düşündüm de bu oyun tavsiye edilmez dlclerin ve oyunun kendi fiyatı artması mı dersiniz oyunu hala optimizasyon ve bugları düzeltmemeleri ve son zamanlarda çıkarttıkları yeni dlc ile yeni katil falan bir yere kadar iş yapabiliyor yüksek ranklar da fazla iş yapmaz anlayacağınız oyunun rank sistemi baya bir değişti ve dengesiz oldu üstüne de üstlük katiller ve survivor perkleri değiştire değiştire oyunu daha nasıl içine ederiz mantığıyla gitmişler oyunun yeni mekaniklerini kast etmiyorum bile bu firma benim gözüm de dolandırıcı benim kendi şahsı fikrim bu kanaat de dlc çıkarayım nede olsa alırlar cebime para girer yine de oyunu optimizasyon ve bugları fixlemeyim kafasındalar.
Muy buen juego, el unico fallo es el matchmaking

This was one of the best games I'd played in a long time until they released their first DLC. It introduced a horribly designed and toxic killer. She ignores all the mechanics built into the game for the survivors. After spending a couple hours this weekend trying to play with my friend and my only advice for every Nurse game we ran into was "Just accept death if she finds you" made for a tough sell. Needless to say I don't think my group of friends and I will be playing until the Developers aknowledge the huge mistake they made in the horribly designed and toxic Nurse killer.

I'll update the review with more details of all the things I loved about the game, but unfortunately the fact that I'll run into a Nurse at least 20% of my games is more than reason enough to play the game anymore.

UPDATED PATCH 1.2.: 
I still do not recommend this game. There's still a large volume of bugs the devs don't seem to want to address, and instead are prioritizing releasing new content when the foundation has made very little progression. It seems the devs are wanting to take the reins into their own hands and mold the game into what they want, instead of what their audience wants. Which can be okay at times, but not when the overall vision going into a clear, bad direction. They have also indicated on multiple occasions that they don't even know their own game, in the sense that they don't know what the gameplay is like for the players, they're not "in player's shoes" per se. They also don't seem to think through the reckless changes they make and the consequences that come with them, despite having PTR periods to test these changes.Another bad point is that they don't seem to like to take criticism to improve the game from those who play - the community.

I would say to keep this off your wishlist for now and wait about a year til to see if the Devs come around to correcting their game.

Как понять, что игра хорошая? Это когда ты садишься и думаешь: "поиграю 30 минут и спать", а на деле прошло уже 80 минут и спать как то не хочется. В Dead by Daylight время летит очень быстро, хотя вроде бы ничего нового игра не предлагает. Всё, что мы видим на экране своего рода прятки, один ищет другие прячутся, просто тут ещё нагнетающая атмосфера(звуки эти и вид) добавляется. Но при всей этой простоте идеи, игра держит.
Играть интереснее за маньяка, но проще за выживших, так как их больше.
Из минусов тоже хочется кое что выделить:
Конечно карты разные, мы это видим по названию в начале каждой игры, но всё таки есть в них, что то идентичное, они как бы разные и как бы одинаковые. Всё таки это не дота и такое однообразие окружающего мира может надоесть.
В любом случае буду играть дальше.
8/10

Игра невероятно интересная!
В нее весело играть как самому (в рандоме), так и с друзьями.
Очень долгое время игре удается держать вас в няпряженном и напуганном состоянии, что будет интересно любым любителям хоррор жанра 
Плюсы:
Графика
Оригинальность
Минусы: 
Есть еще некоторые баги и недоработки

Si lo que buscas es un juego perfecto, pulido, y con cantidad de contenido... Pues te vas a tener que esperar.
El juego tiene errores, muchos, pero hay que admitir que poco a poco tras cada actualización la experiencia de juego mejora aunque sea un poco, que se agradece.
Si te dan igual los errores que se le puedan sacar, y eres tolerante a cosas como el encontrarte algún que otro bug, el alto ms en ciertas partidas, y tienes la paciencia de jugarlo, viendo poco a poco el contenido nuevo que van sacando con el tiempo (el cual, hay que añadir que la gran mayoría de las veces es de pago), verás que es entretenido.
Es lo que tiene, el juego tendrá todos los errores que quieras y más, pero después de todo, las risas y el entretenerte con amigos están ahí, lo que le da más valor al juego. Juégalo contrándote en divertirte con cualquier idiotez que te pase mientras corres, o matas, y ya está.
Recomendado sin duda, siempre y cuando no busques una obra maestra. <3

Negativ finde ich allerdings und das stört mich wirklich sehr dass man egal ob Überlebender oder Killer verbal angegriffen wird "asshole" "pussy" noob camper, dumb Killer, etc.. sind noch die harmlosen Sachen, auf die man nicht eingehen sollte, dennoch ärgert man sich, dass man das ganze Spiel so "ernst" nimmt und für viele anscheinend das Leben dran hängt, schließlich sollte es Spaß machen sei es In der Sicht des Überlebenden oder des Killers.

Very fun to play alone or with friends. Queue times are fucking awful with 3+ people, decent if you play solo or with one other person. There should be more character customisation options though, however you get a few cool things when you prestiege. Kinda sucks that you get hardly any points if the killer rage quits mid-game or even later. P.S - the invisible guy is aids af. But would recommend regardless. (wear earplugs if you play with a friend who's easily scared - trust me). +rep, totally not addictive.

我沒有時光機，不能退費 ,

但你們可以選擇不購買,避免浪費時間及金錢

本人強烈**不推薦**大家購買這款遊戲
現列出其中幾項不推薦的原因:

**遊戲動作延遲**
遊戲伺服器是由殺手玩家開設的,
如果殺手爛線的話,生存者的動作會造成延遲

**大量拔線流,開場時往往只剩下三名人類玩家** (正常四名)

**Bug遲遲不解決，每次更新總又有新的Bug**

**內有大量改檔及作弊玩家**   部份殺手擁有全視之眼，人類熱能探測器
進入遊戲大廳時,經常出現 房主使用作弊程式,現自動退出大廳 的警告字眼

I LIKE IT

Updated Review. Since 2016 this game has improved a lot and now I can find lobbies at anytime and the servers are great. I am not a hardcore player but I play on and off. So far even though there are a few bugs here and there, the devs do their best to fix the game. It has been an amazing 6 years with lots of content. I have this game on my ps4 and switch as well and play it all the time. The cross play is amazing as well.

This game what can you I say is a hate it or love it game you can hate it all you want. But the game is one of a kind if you don't get your fix here where else will you get it from? I find that some days you have great games, then there are those days you play against SWF teams and are very toxic or the killer is having a bad day and they camp you non stop. Game does get frustrating at times hence why I recommend taking a break from it every now and then.

I will be playing this game a lot more some people have played 10000hrs plus I have not quite got there yet even though I had this game from day one. I just get busy with other games and then I come back to this, it will always be my main game.

So all in all I would recommend this game to anyone, it is fun sometimes toxic but mostly fun play with your friends or play by yourself. This game needs a lot of time and dedication to get good. You need to level up your characters to build them up and share perks.

Für mich persönlich ist es ein gelungenes Spiel zum Zeitvertreib, wenn auch ausbaufähig. Es ist kein Spiel welches ein anderes komplett ersetzt, vielmehr sehe ich es als Lückenfüller für Momente des Wartens oder der kurzen Langenweile. Auch wenn das Spielprinzip immer das Gleiche ist, verliert es meiner Meinung nach trotzdem nicht an Reiz. Durch die Blutnetze möchte man immer und immer weiter machen, um unbedingt zu sehen, welcher nächste Perk auf einem wartet. Es gibt zwar hier und da einige Bugs und auch die besagten Warteschlangen gibt es teilweise. In letzter Zeit hatte ich damit aber eher weniger Probleme. Man sollte auf jeden Fall nicht zu viel erwarten, der damalige kleine Hype war meiner Ansicht nach nicht gerechtfertigt, dafür ist das Spiel einfach noch nicht gut genug ausgebaut. Trotzdem kann ich hier bedenkenlos einen Daumen nach oben geben. Für das was es hat ist es gut.

j'aurai essayé d'aimer ce jeu...Sincèrement, pourquoi ne pas tester le "gameplay" avant de mettre le jeu en vente? Rien à faire, si vous voulez jouer le tueur, car les survivants qui connaissent bien le gameplay vont abuser des défauts du jeu.Il suffit de sauter par les fenêtres des bâtiments quand tu vois le tueur et il ne lui sera pas possible de t'attraper, car il n'est pas assez rapide pour contourner les murs ou même de traverser les fenêtres. Donc, tu as seulement besoin de sauter la fenêtre à nouveau quand il arrive. Pendant ce temps, les autres survivants activent les générateurs et si tu veux essayer de tuer le survivant qui active le générateur, il va lui aussi abuser des fenêtres, donc avantage 0 pour le tueur...Sérieusement si vous voulez essayer un jeu de même type, attendez la sortie de "friday 13 the game"

Ok first of all I would only recommend this game for you and a group friends taking turns playing the killer in a private game I'll explain later. but for right now I want to tell the main complains I have with it.

1. This game loses it's scare factor real quick in public games I'd say in about 8 hours you will be used to it.


1. FIX THE FUCKING MATCH MAKING FOR FUCK SAKE! God damn dude this game has been out for 4 months. Stop being retards and adding new killers and fix the basic of the game or add dedicated server listings jesus even most basic valve games have that shit.... you know why? BECAUSE IT WORKS!

2. The cheaters in this game the few I have come accross are pretty annoying and since you can't even fix the above MM I have no faith in any ANTI cheat you have in place for the time being.

3. I would wait till this game goes on sale really cheap and maybe alot new people will get it so you can enjoy it alot more or hell maybe if they can fix the basic problems one day we will have ranked games but for now I'm going to move on.....
